name: AGRESTIC
description:
AGRESTIC [uh-gres-tik]
unpolished; awkward:

A Chill Pixel Planting Game
Dig, Plant, Grow, Chill

CONTROLS:
A = Move Screen Left --- D = Move Screen Right
E / ESC / Left Click Yellow Square = Menu
Left Mouse = Break Ground / Plant Seeds / Break Plants / Place Ground
Right Mouse = Stop Placing Seeds & Ground / Leave Menu

Life is Short = Be Creative
